DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare rate risk primary cardiovascular event among elderly patient newly initiate therapy atorvastatin simvastatin . The specific objective project : 1 ) examine demographic clinical characteristic elderly patient atorvastatin simvastatin newly initiate ; 2 ) compare cardiovascular event rate elderly patient atorvastatin simvastatin newly initiate .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Events Based On Statin Initiation In The Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: All subject meet sample definition , inclusion criterion , none exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: ≥ 1 fill atorvastatin simvastatin ( include combination therapy ) 01 July 2006 30 November 2008 Age ≥ 65 year year index date Continuous enrollment medical pharmacy benefit analytic period 1 fill statin dyslipidemia medication 12month preindex period A pharmacy fill clopidogrel nitrate ( except concomitant hydralazine ) 12month preindex period Patients evidence cardiovascular event 12month preindex period . Patients receive atorvastatin simvastatin index date Patients unknown gender region Patients receive dyslipidemia medication index drug within 1 month ( 30 day ) follow index date
